name: Mad Rad Racing
description:
In this gbjam game You are a novice racer determined to take down the best of the best, "Rocket Racer". Race across 4 unique racetracks to claim your place as the number one racer in the universe!

Track List:
  • Mystic Forest Monument
  • Rocky Island Raceway
  • Velocity Volcano
  • Crystal City Circuit

Music art and programming by me @Bourbonbrick

Font somepx regular by Somepx

This game can also be found on here on Gamejolt.
